bibl.title: Letter from Emilie Lawrence Reed to Herbert S. Hollander, September 1931

div1.p: Emilie Lawrence Reed expresses her appreciation for Hollander's newspaper article on Walter Reed.

div1.head: Letter from Emilie Lawrence Reed to Herbert S. Hollander, September 1931
div1.opener:
Blue Ridge Summit-
Sept- 1931
Mr. Herbert S. Hollander,
Washington D. C.
Dear Mr Hollander:-
div1.p:
Two friends have
just sent me from Washington
clippings from this Sunday Post
Sept. 13th, “From Fever swamps
to Immortality”- the Soul
uplifting tribute you have paid
my dear husband meant so much
to me & my daughter, that I
cannot refrain from sending
you our grateful thanks for
your appreciation of his work.
Dr Reed died 29 years ago
the 23rd of this Nov, And
the these have been many,
many acknowledgements of
his gift to humanity have
been securred by me, not
one has ever touched my
heart or been more grate-
fully accepted than your
gracious words that lay
before me.

Please accept our heart-
felt appreciation-
